p: Table 6 summarizes the case management where available. Concerning the applied protocol after diagnosis and management of cases of Influenza Pandemic (H1N1) 2009, two articles described how patients positive for H1N1 were hospitalized/isolated, and close contacts or persons seated within 2 m around the index patient during the flight were quarantined [ 26, 39]. One article described that persons tested positive to H1N1 with RT-PCR were offered oseltamivir, and were sent home or to a facility for isolation [ 21]. The ECDC report describes the management of treating EVD patients in designated hospitals, including isolation, personal protective equipment, samples, waste management and post-mortem procedures [ 27].
